# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int = 10)
    line = ""
    words = split(text, " ")
    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            println(line)
            line = ""
        end
        line *= word * " "
    end
    println(line)
    nothing
end

# Example usage:
wrap_string("This is a very very long string that needs to be wrapped after every 10 characters.")
```
